In England, in the seven days to 01 September, there were 174,993 new confirmed cases (309.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 August, there were 181,319 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 3% (6,326 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 September is 6,046,799 (10,692.8 cases per 100,000 population).
